001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003/**
004 * A functional object (strategy)
005 * interface that contain the only method, which
006 * is called by the validator framework to get an
007 * identifier or name of a model element or parser
008 * and report an error about it.
009 *
010 * @author rodche
011 */
012public interface Identifier {
013
014  /**
015   * Gets the id or name of a model element or
016   * other object that matters during a validation
017   * and worth mentioning in a error message.
018   *
019   * This is called by the Validator framework to get a
020   * domain specific identifier or name of a model element
021   * to report an error about.
022   *
023   * This interface is required, because a domain specific 'get id'
024   * method, if any, is not known to the core validation framework
025   * in advance, and toString method may not be satisfactory.
026   *
027   * @param obj a model element or, e.g., stream
028   * @return id
029   */
030  String identify(Object obj);
031
032}
